lead_paragraph: At the Wadsworth’s Matrix contemporary art program, the latest in a series of solo exhibitions, a multimedia installation explores notions of shape-shifting and appropriation.
snippet: At the Wadsworth’s Matrix contemporary art program, the latest in a series of solo exhibitions, a multimedia installation explores notions of shape-shifting and appropriation.

headline.main: Finding the Link Between Werewolves and Karaoke
headline.seo: At the Wadsworth, a Contemporary Take on the Psychedelic Aesthetic
headline.print_headline: Finding the Link Between Werewolves and Karaoke
